column6: It's new villains, new friends, and some familiar faces that promise to make Peter's life messier than ever before. This is where it's all happening.  AMAZING SPIDER-MAN: Same Old Power. Same Old Responsibility. Brand New Day.
column8: | colorist:Morry Hollowell | penciller (cover):Steve McNiven | writer:Dan Slott | inker:Dexter Vines
